getCalendar

net.fortuna.ical4j.model.Calendar getCalendar(java.lang.String calendarName,
                                              java.lang.String account,
                                              java.lang.String password,
                                              java.util.Date startDate,
                                              java.util.Date endDate)
Get a remote calendar

Parameters:
calendarName - name of the calendar to get
account - the remote service account
password - the remote service password
startDate - date from when to get the calendar events
endDate - date to when to get calendar events
Returns:
iCalendar format of the remote calendar

                                              java.lang.String account,
                                              java.lang.String pswd,
                                              long from,
                                              long to)
Get the remote calendar events between a specify date interval

Parameters:
calendarName - the targeted calendar
account - the corresponding service account
pswd - the service password
from - the starting date
to - the ending date
Returns:
the calendar in iCal format
